name: The Great Gonzo in WordRider
overview: The Great Gonzo in WordRider is an educational book and video game set produced for the Commodore 64 and Apple II in 1985. In the game, the Swedish Chef has invited Camilla the chicken to a castle for dinner. Gonzo realizes that his girlfriend will be the main course, and sets out to rescue her. Dr. Bunsen Honeydew helps Gonzo by giving him words that he can use to build machines; Gonzo can use the machines to overcome various obstacles on his way to the castle. Gonzo travels through various locations on his quest, including Chickago, Yellowyolk National Park, Carlsbird Caverns and the Hen-a-layin' Mountains.
